Regulation Name(s): Gamma-glutamyl transpeptidase and isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for N Latex CDT Kit for quantitative measurement of carbohydrate-deficient transferrin in human serum using particle-enhanced immunonephelometry.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic for quantitative determination of carbohydrate-deficient transferrin (%CDT) in human serum using particle-enhanced immunonephelometry as a tool to identify possible chronic heavy alcohol consumption.
